explains: n. 火炮，大炮；炮兵，炮兵部队
wordGroup: heavy artillery 重型火炮，重型炮兵

sentences.en: The town is under heavy artillery fire.
sentences.cn: 该市镇处于密集的炮火之下。

sentences.en: From 1935 to 1937 he was in the artillery.
sentences.cn: 从1935年到1937年他在炮兵部队。

sentences.en: Using tanks and heavy artillery, they seized the town.
sentences.cn: 他们使用坦克和重炮攻下了这座城市。
